extendedInfo.description: Fancy Live Wall is a Live Wallpaper that creates themed wallpapers using pictures on your device. You can select individual pictures or albums to be displayed as your wallpaper, along with a theme you would like your pictures to be fitted into. Your wallpaper will change at specific time interval according to your preference.Features: - Pictures slide show - Themes - Fading effect when changing pictures - Edge fading - Double tap to change pictureAs this is a Live Wallpaper, the icon will *not* appear on your launcher. To activate Fancy Live Wall, press Menu button while you are on your home screen, select Wallpaper -> Live Wallpaper -> Fancy Live Wall. If you found any bugs, please send an e-mail to dzulnizam@bulb-vision.com with the description of the bug.

reviews.title: it\'s beautiful
reviews.comment: dear dev, it\'s really beautiful.why don\'t you come up with transition updates and animations...? thanx for the beauty..plz update with some cool features..thanx in anticipation
reviews.author: reviwz my

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This LWP just took my art collection to a whole new level. The vintage poloroid theme is just amazing. Best LWP for showing off your art or photo collections on ur phone.
reviews.author: Tyler Howard

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.comment: Very very nicely done, great looks and exactly was I was looking for ..I am really loving it..just no lag...what more you can expect...its 10 star out of 5...congrats for a very good app..I wonder why it doesn\'t feature in the top 10 app in Android market
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Good LWP
reviews.comment: For my purposes this is probably the best LWP I\'ve tried so far. However I\'d like to see an option to display the full image in the \"wrong\" orientation (i.e. landscape image with device in portrait orientation & visa versa) instead of filling the screen and displaying only part of the picture. Thanks.
reviews.author: Mike Dooley

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
reviews.comment: Finally one that allows me to choose the photos used.  But 15 seconds as fastest transition is WAY too long...please fix :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: I don\'t know how many slideshow apps I went through. This is the one that made it the easiest to use and does exactly what I wanted. This is one app that will NEVER get taken off my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Smooth and cool
reviews.comment: I like this wallpaper cause you can choose your pictures individually and it runs smoothly in the background if they could come up with different themes and with different displays that would be awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nicely done. I really love it. Just make the frame size bigger and add few more effects...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great wallpaper slideshow!
reviews.comment: All I wanted was a wallpaper that would cycle through pictures I select. This does exactly that. And it doesn\'t use any permissions besides SD. I\'d happily buy an advanced version to support the author if it were available. Only one minor negative, I found the settings screen a bit confusing because it wasn\'t obvious if changes were applied or not.
reviews.author: Ben Smith

reviews.title: If this app not 5 stars, no apps can.

reviews.title: Small Annoyances
